title: 't hey' ID
content:
Hello there,

Does anyone recognize this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5230.jpg)
  
I suggested to my friend (who asked me if I knew anything similar) that it looked like a weird reworking of Electra. He seemed offended for some reason.

Oh well, if anyone could help me out I'd greatly appreciate it.

Kind regards,

Graham
author: G T

comments.content:
oh dear, I should really read things before posting them as that is not boomer…

please ignore all the gibberish I speak.

(though if anyone does indeed know what the above sample is, that'd be beaut)

Thanks,

Graham

Your example is Quiosco: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Quiosco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144346/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Quiosco "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Quiosco")

Designed by Cyrus Highsmith (same as designed Boomer) and influenced by Dwiggins & Electra.

-- Kent.

Excellent,

Thanks very much Kent.

I wonder why my friend had it down as 'Boomer'?

Thanks again,

Graham
